backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling contact form submissions, password- and role-protected admin queries, and simple user profile storage with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented admin password login, dashboard updates, and session persistence with referenced files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text mapping frontend file paths to short descriptions of their purpose within the site and admin panel.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, title, and root element for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with QueryClientProvider and hash-based routing between the marketing site and password-protected admin page.
Password-only admin panel that authenticates with a fixed password and fetches contact submissions for display with logout and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button component that manages authentication state and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Marketing About section describing Vinod Electriclasâ€™ background, expertise, and product focus.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders contact info cards and a form using useContactForm, showing success or error alerts based on submission status.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the homepage hero banner with product tagline, CTA buttons, and a hero image with smooth scrolling handlers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Shows a grid of service cards and a gallery of product images describing panels, meters, and motor-control solutions.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Lists key business advantages in a grid, each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Provides footer branding, contact details, external links, and an admin link.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Implements a sticky header with logo, nav links, smooth scrolling, and a mobile menu via a sheet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, handling authentication, access control initialization, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPasswordSessi: Manages admin session state in sessionStorage with login and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Custom hook managing contact form state, validation, and submission via a mutation, with auto-reset and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, status tracking, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for admin checks, fetching submissions, submitting contact forms, and managing user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining theme variables, light/dark palettes, global styles, and utility layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that mounts React, providing QueryClient and InternetIdentity context providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, fonts, components, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project requirements, admin password flow, existing issues, and pending feature requests.
